short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay informed about the present time and date across the globe

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay informed about the present day, time and date across the globe

Easily find the day, date, and time for any location worldwide by simply hovering over the world map. Additionally, It provides a web search bar to look up things on the internet.

Once you install The World Tab extension, your browser's new tab will be replaced.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing The World Tab Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab, Homepage takeover, and search to that provided by the service with results by Bing and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: https://theworldtab.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://theworldtab.com/terms-conditions/
